alert.note: Alert for Northern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 24 at 2:34PM MDT until October 25 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 9 AM CDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 expected. * WHERE...Northern Lea County. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 9 AM CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
